subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: When 17 of the N.H.L.’s top players were asked whether they favored a full ban on head contact, 7 said yes; 4 said no; 6 said they were not certain.
snippet: When 17 of the N.H.L.’s top players were asked whether they favored a full ban on head contact, 7 said yes; 4 said no; 6 said they were not certain.
